HACD::GraphVertex
HACD::HACDProvides an implementation of the Hierarchical Approximate Convex Decomposition (HACD) technique described in "A Simple and Efficient Approach for 3D Mesh Approximate Convex Decomposition" Game Programming Gems 8 - Chapter 2.8, p.202. A short version of the chapter was published in ICIP09 and is available at ftp://ftp.elet.polimi.it/users/Stefano.Tubaro/ICIP_USB_Proceedings_v2/pdfs/0003501.pdf
